description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Father's Day,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Marinated Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lemon, 1/3 cup juice, 1 tbs finely grated lemon rind, 1 cut into wedges (wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash chickens and pat dry with paper towel. Using kitchen scissors, cut along both sides of the backbone and remove from both chickens. Turn chickens over and place, skin-side up, on a clean, flat surface. Press down firmly to flatten. Cover and set aside.
Combine lemon juice, rind, oil, garlic, chilli and herbs together in a bowl. Rub herb mixture into skin of both chickens.

Heat hooded barbecue on medium. Place chickens skin-side up on oiled grill. Cook for 25 minutes. Turn over chicken and press down with spatula. Close and cook for a further 25 minutes or until skin is crisp and chicken is cooked through. Transfer to a chopping board, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5-10 minutes. Cut into pieces. Serve with lemon wedges.
